author: be5invis
body:
With an analogue between PS concepts and the category theory:

- Cmdlets ←→ Kleisli Category
- Streams ←→ Monadic types
- `|` ←→ Kleisli Composition (`>=>`)
- `cat` ←→ `return`

Could we extend PS’s type system to support other monad types? For example, list comprehension.

comments.author: ArieHein
comments.body: Something you can not achieve via Add-Type ?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @be5invis if you're serious, I would suggest writing a RFC.

title: Make PowerShell Really Monadic (in Category Theory)
